Vice President, Operations at Gadget Guard
February 6, 2014, Travis reported directly to Bill

Working with Bill Curtis has been a delight! He had the challenge of not only leading a team of pioneers, but the team was also remote. He found a way to strike a balance of allowing team members operate in and develop personal strengths while keeping them "at home" with regular team meetings and 1-on-1 conversations. With each and every challenge, Bill always maintained a positive outlook, and I found he had a way to draw the good out of any circumstance. More than that, Bill's diverse professional background served us well. He was regularly coming up with new ideas and strategies that enabled the team to "do more with less." I cannot recommend Bill enough. If you have any questions about my experience with Bill, feel free to call me at 720-722-2761. Warm Regards,Travis Campbell

A natural talent discovering new ways to use tech to connect and convert, while operating at the ‚Äúspeed of startup‚Äù. A data-driven, technology, and relationship-oriented professional, Travis is passionate about helping companies apply technology to solve businesses challenges, grow revenue, and increase market share. ‚≠êÔ∏è ALL-STAR MOMENTS:‚≠êÔ∏è  ¬ª Led business transformation engagements with top enterprises, influencing opportunities which led to $8M IN REVENUE.    ¬ª Created regional awareness of nearly unknown All-In-One Sales and Marketing SaaS brand, developed and implemented engagement and education strategies resulting CUSTOMER FOOTPRINT GROWTH OF 413% in two years.  ¬ª Identified top local influencers and influencer organizations to the (Infusionsoft) target market, building a GROUNDSWELL OF 70+ RESELLER PARTNERS.  ¬ª Executed key thought leadership strategy by spearheading development of educational workshop which was SHARED WITH 15,000+ BUSINESSES.  ¬ª Powered a solopreneur 'brochure' website with marketing automation, to connect and convert, taking it from $0 revenue to ~$500,000 IN TWO YEARS.[ [ Questions or inquiries: Please message Travis here, or reach him directly at 602-741-6787. ] ]
